com.sap.integration.erp.dummy.jpa

Class JpaLayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sap.integration.utils.integrationdb.jpa.AbstractJpaLayer
      • com.sap.integration.erp.dummy.jpa.JpaLayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Customer, InventoryReport, Invoice, InvoiceLine, Item, Payment, PaymentLine, PaymentReport, SalesDelivery, SalesDeliveryLine, SalesOrder, SalesOrderLine, StockData, Warehouse

    @MappedSuperclass
public class JpaLayer
extends AbstractJpaLayer
    Base class for entities within Dummy ERP DB covers the connection initialization, simplifies access to the EntityManager, etc. It also adds and handles the "lastUpdateTime" property for each entity.
